name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: AI Applications Engineer Full Stack - Agentic AI & Generative AI Specialist

Collaborated with product managers to design Agentic Workflows using Python orchestration, Angular visualization, and AWS EKS auto-scaling for real-time AI Agent communication protocols.
